The general took the shots in the back and did not reply. He simply
walked up to the outer rim and looked for a working drone.

Vorpal: Is this section activated?

Drone: Yes General. Tension is on.

There was no more said. He calmly went back to the group, then grabbed
Darkfate and hurled him on the rubyline plate. The electric tension
started cumulating and was soon going to fry Darkfate...

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Airly" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Darfate/Nightstrike::
> 
> "AND THIS MANIFICIENT BASE WOULD HAVE A MAGNIFICIENT BOSS:
MEE!!!!"Said Dark fate while he traechorous attacked Vorpal, in ispite
of his wound and shot 25 times against him.
> 
> Nightstrike didn't moved, the best politics always is obey to most
powerful, and ceirtainly Vorpal looked more powerful.
>   ----- Original Message ----- 
>   From: Nic 
>   To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
>   Sent: Wednesday, July 06, 2005 6:29 PM
>   Subject: Re: The Awakened
> 
> 
>   Vorpal was getting more and more surprised. Pleasantly surprised.
> 
>   Vorpal: Aaah! More troops, I see! You have spirits in you, and that is
>   what I will require of you. But I warn you to keep your arrogance for
>   the Cybertronians or I will personally make you regret it. Kill me,
>   though, and our Master will make sure you suffer from something worse
>   than termination.
> 
>   He let the threat sink in just a little bit.
> 
>   Vorpal: In the mean time, I welcome you to Searing Eye Base.
> 
>   He waved his arm towards the construction site. Over thousands of
>   kilometers, trenches were being dug and rubyline metal installed in
>   them. The effect was that The land itself seemed as if it was
burning..
